about: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with hands-on experience building production applications. I started as an intern and grew into a full-stack role, developing strong skills in frontend development, API integration, and CI/CD pipelines. I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and continuously learning new technologies.

description: Develop and maintain features using React.js and DevExpress framework
Enhance legacy code and resolve production bugs to improve system reliability
Participate in code reviews and QA testing for stable deployments
Developed and optimized frontend components using React.js, HTML, and CSS
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate APIs and ensure smooth user experiences
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps
Built reusable React components with dynamic data handling capabilities
Created web-based variant of existing product under mentorship

projects.title: Medical App
projects.description: Contributed as Backend Developer in a team building a healthcare application using FastAPI and PostgreSQL. Helped build scalable architecture and database solutions until the project reached a stable release.

projects.title: Savings Tracker
projects.description: Personal React Native mobile app for tracking savings goals. Built as a frontend-only project to explore mobile development.

education.description: Currently in 4th year, focusing on software engineering and web development.

certifications.title: Exploring Data Transformation with Google Cloud
Innovating with Google Cloud Artificial Intelligence
